(38) Kórana vantar peninga til ferðarinnar I have shown that the verbs þurfa and vanta do not have the same meaning. Þurfa makes a
Choirs-the.ACC lacks money.ACC for trip-the.GEN assertions about what is needed in the ideal state, whereas vanta makes an assertion about
'The choirs lack money for the trip' what we are short of in the ideal state.
